title: Mycobacteriales
text:
The Mycobacteriales are an order of <a href="bacteria">bacteria</a>.
Phylogeny.
The currently accepted taxonomy is based on the <a href="List%20of%20Prokaryotic%20names%20with%20Standing%20in%20Nomenclature">List of Prokaryotic names with Standing in Nomenclature</a> (LPSN). The phylogeny is based on whole-genome analysis.
